oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Merle Haggard Show at the McElroy Auditorium
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Haggard, Merle
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: One color window card (black on white) Hatch poster announcing the Merle Haggard Show featuring Merle Haggard, Bonnie Owens and the Strangers with the Plainsmen at the McElroy Auditorium on April 27. Poster features metal photoplates of Merle Haggard, Bonnie Owens, and the Strangers.
